name: Tanont Chumroen
description: '''Tanont Chumroen''', better known by his nickname '''Nont''', is a Thai singer and actor. A native of [[Phuket]], he graduated from [[Bangkok University]] in 2013. In 2012, he won the first season of ''[[The Voice Thailand]]'', where he began establishing a large following. In 2018, he won the 4th season of ''[[The Mask Singer (Thai TV series)|The Mask Singer]]''.
